blurb: Invia is a scholar on Roshar.
Mazzu is a town in northwestern Azir on Roshar
Aluko is a member of the ground troup in Igneous Cavern.
Lahar is an ardent on Roshar.
Nalem is one of Gare's sergeants in Amaram's army on Roshar.
Iadon was the first king of Arelon after the Reod on Sel. He is the father of Raoden.
Ethid is a scion in Azir on Roshar during the Era of Solitude.
Kwati is a corrupt government official who lives at the Purelake on Roshar.
The three Realms—Physical, Cognitive, and Spiritual—constitute the fundamental structure of the cosmere.
Aimia is a group of islands on Roshar as well as one of the Silver Kingdoms.
Notum is an honorspren who serves as the captain of the ship Honor's Path.
Donny is a koloss-blooded on Scadrial.
Malen is one of the sexes of the singer species.
Isabi is a young scholar on Roshar.
Paalm was a female kandra of the Third Generation.
Toral was a lighteyed man from Highprince Aladar's camp on Roshar.
Herve is a footman for Waxillium Ladrian on Scadrial.
A scion is an Azish priest.
Metals are used central to the Metallic Arts on Scadrial.
Pewter mistings are also called Brutes.
Hesho is a kitsen captain and the former king of an absolute monarchy of his species.
Wayne is a Twinborn on Scadrial from Era 2.
Gavil's Carriages is a taxiing company in Elendel.
Scrak is an axehound on Roshar owned by Balat Davar.
Callsign Vigor is a former cadet in the DDF Flight Schoo.
Granny Hilde is the operator of a passwall in Luthadel on Scadrial.
Tenem is a soft, light-orange vegetable native to Roshar.
Geant is a nation located on the continent of Sycla on Sel.
Jaism is a religion on Scadrial.
Eshen is the former Queen of Arelon on Sel.
The nobles are a race of humans on pre-Catacendre Scadrial.
Kalad is a historical figure on Nalthis who started the Manywar.
Triax is a small nation in southern Roshar.
Gward is the leader of a faction of pirates in the belt of the nowhere.
Abigail Casey is a Reckoner and often in command of operations within the Texas Reckoners.
Melend Liese was a noble in the Final Empire.
Reven is the king of Seevis, one of the Rim Kingdoms of Taldain.
Puuli is a lighthouse keeper in a small port village in eastern Roshar.
Bilko is an informant of some kind used by David Charleston before he became a member of the Reckoners.
Nlent is a squat Thaylen guard on Vstim's caravan.
Chanarach, also known as Chana, is one of the ten Heralds of Honor.
Fuego is an Epic in Prof's squad.
Simol is a historical figure mentioned in Words of Radiance.
KRELL is the acronym for a paramilitary force within the Superiority's Department of Protective Services.
Gavam is a woman on Roshar.
Klisn is a Thaylen sailor and a crewmember of the Wandersail.
Riina is a member of the Ire.
Human is a koloss of unknown age created in the Final Empire.
Brass is one of the alloys used in the Metallic Arts.
The Prime Aqasix is the title of the elected ruler of Azir.
The Kerla is an area of desert at the center of the Dayside on Taldain.
Sophi Tarcsel is an inventor in Elendel on Scadrial.
Steen is a kingdom at the tip of a peninsula in southwestern Roshar.
Niter is the head of the Cobalt Guard in Alethkar on Roshar during the War of Reckoning.
Lord Teven Renoux is a noble from the Final Empire.
Leras is the first Vessel of the Shard Preservation, originally from Yolen.
The Synod is the ruling council of the Keepers of Terris.
Highprince Yenev is a former highprince of Alethkar prior to the Kholin unification of the nation.
Drama is a cadet in either Inkwell Flight or Firestorm Flight in the DDF.
Wvlan is a Thaylen sailor on the Wandersail.
Benru is a town on Roshar.
Niali the Just is a philosopher on Roshar.
Szeth is a Shin man from Roshar.
The Beggars' Feast is an Alethi tradition.
Grund is an urchin in Kholinar.
Kryst is a woman who is married to Jor on Roshar.
Teleb is a lighteyed officer and Shardbearer in Dalinar's warcamp on Roshar.
Frost is a dragon from Yolen.
Diren was an Elantrian on Sel.
Glyphs are a writing system used on Roshar.
The Surges are the ten fundamental forces on Roshar.
Borea is an honorspren who serves as the first mate of the ship Honor's Path.
Brade Shimabukuro is a human woman and Cytonic licensed to Winzik.
Captain Bedes is an young noble in Luthadel.
Brightness Velat is an Alethi lighteyes and scholar on Roshar specializing in cartography.
Gremm is a tenasi pirate in the belt of the nowhere.
Brill is a construction worker in Elendel on Scadrial.
Laqqi is a village in central Emul on Roshar.
Taudr is a constable of the Elendel constabulary on Scadrial.
The Iviad is a literary work on Roshar.
Captain Orson Ansed is a member of the Evensong Police Department.
David Charleston, an orphaned teen living in Newcago, is a member of the Reckoners.
Sycla is one name for the continent on Sel that Elantris is found on.
The Shards of Adonalsium, or Shards for short, are sixteen pieces of the power of creation.
Macob is the head of a caravan of merchants on Roshar.
Camon is a skaa from Luthadel on Scadrial.
DeHwo is the JinDo name of Dereth, the founder of the Shu-Dereth religion on Sel.
Yolen is the planet in the cosmere where the Shattering of Adonalsium happened.
Tezim is an alias used by Ishar, one of the ten Heralds of Honor.
The Covad Fragment is an old untranslated manuscript thought to be written in Dawnchant.
Adien is an Elantrian from Sel.
Rilla is a woman on Roshar.
Nakal is an Rosharan man on Elhokar's staff.
The heklo are a member species of the Superiority.

Zetah the Voiced is a Rosharan scholar.
Fafen is a princess of Idris on Nalthis.
Malan is a lighteyed Alethi military officer on Roshar.
Dr. Thior is a doctor and the head of Defiant Defense Force.
The Largo is a starfighter used by the DDF.
Kheni is a poor woman who lives in Kholinar after the coming of the True Desolation.
Feral is an Epic with mutation powers.
Ishar is one of the ten Heralds of Honor.
Mist is a term used to refer to a phenomenon in the world of Scadrial.
Daius is an attorney in Elendel on Scadrial
Corgi is a taynix.
Idani is an Alethi woman on Roshar.
Wzmal is a man mentioned in one of the records in the Urithiru gem archive.
Creer and his brother are members of Bridge Twenty.
Callsign Sushi is a member of Nightmare Flight.
Finis is an UrDail from ReDawn.
Vexil the Wise is the Prime of  the Makabaki kingdom of Emul on Roshar during the Era of Solitude.
Sonic Snare is an Epic.
Kauri is a kitsen who travels to Starsight under the leadership of Hesho.
Fedik was a member of the party that travelled with Alendi to the Well of Ascension.
Mashe is the star of the Selish system.
Treff is a member of Bridge Four.
Maben is a chambermaid on King Taravangian's staff.
Tibon was a lighteyed Alethi on Roshar.
Tomor is an ardent who serves as a junior engineer/artifabrian on Roshar.

Razal is a Terrisman who lives in the Village in Elendel.
Kaloo is an alias used by Raoden.
Paxen is an Idrian slumlord in Hallandren on Nalthis.
Cladent, going by the nickname Clubs, is a member of Kelsier's crew.
Armal is a cousin of Steris Harms.
The Fresa is a starfighter used by the DDF.
Koolf is a member of Bridge Four on Roshar.
Drehy is a member of Bridge Four.
The Conventical of Seran is a fortress of the Canton of Inquisition on Scadrial.
Horen is an Elantrian on Sel.
Rasan is another name for Rayse.

Koron is an Alethi accent.
Callsign Jager is a member of Nightmare Flight.
Happy is a very fat taynix.
Varth is a squadleader in Meridas Amaram's army under Torol Sadeas in Alethkar on Roshar.

Yixli is the Voidspren that leads Khen, Sah, and Kaladin to Revolar.
Steel is one of the alloys used in the Metallic Arts.
Jason Write is the head operative of the Phone Company.
Laral Roshone is the citylady of Hearthstone on Roshar.
Officer Gremt is a member of The Tower on the Dayside of Lord General Raagent.
Eliza Marin was a child who lived on Scadrial.
Bilmy is a resident of New Seran on Scadrial.
Yarda is the general of the Idrian armies.
Vargo is a nickname for Taravangian.
The Valla were a religious sect from Classical Scadrial.
Ixsix is the author of "Emperor" on Roshar.
Colms is Marasi's last name.
Makal is a lighteyed woman on Roshar.
Marco is a resident of Babilar and a friend of Missouri Williams.
Tyvnk is Rysn's 'pet' Shin grass on Roshar.
Stick is an ordinary stick.
Mercy is one of the sixteen Shards of Adonalsium.
Lady Allri Innate is a highborn woman married to Replar Innate in Elendel on Scadrial.
Dilaf is the gragdet of the Dakhor monastery leading up to the invasion of Arelon.
Waber is the gardener at Hearthstone's manor on Roshar.
Blain Charleston is David Charleston's father.
Lord Culee is a noble military commander on Scadrial during the Final Empire.
Sakin is a resident of a small port on the eastern edge of Roshar.
Ashno of Sages is a rich Emuli holy man and former Prime on Roshar.

Alfir is a sanitation worker in Igneous Cavern who visits Spensa's school.

Rusko operates The Weeping Bull in the Roughs.
Kahar is an Elantrian on Sel who cleaned New Elantris.

Venli is a listener scholar in Narak and Eshonai's sister.
Morag is one of the Ashmounts in the Final Empire.

Masha-daughter-Shaliv is a scholar of the Recreance.
Anesa is a lighteyed attendant of Navani Kholin's in Urithiru on Roshar.
Rebsk is a term for a shipmaster or owner that originates from Thaylen merchant ships on Roshar.
Jeber is a resident of Hearthstone on Roshar.
Jabom is a town in southern Marat on Roshar.
Kaise is an Arelene girl.
Laran is a messenger in the Kholin army turned Windrunner of Bridge Four
Gaseous Investiture within the Rosharan system manifests as a number of different Lights.
The skaze are Splinters of Dominion that live on Sel.

Delta Squadron is an elite special ops squad led by Hershel Black.
Drape is a taynix found on Detritus.
Torol Sadeas is an Alethi Highprince on Roshar.
Slink is one of the eight members of Migs' gang in Elendel.
Maare is an Elantrian on Sel.
Tarah is a darkeyed Alethi woman on Roshar.
Salas is the smallest, violet moon of Roshar.

Gold mistings are also called Augurs.
Spook, or Lestibournes, is a skaa Misting on Scadrial.
Nomon is the middle, blue moon of Roshar.
Amphi is Arturo's nickname based on his full callsign Amphisbaena.
A ketek is a form of holy Vorin poetry.
Blome is a Seeker and a bartender for Lord Winsting Innate at his mansion in Elendel on Scadrial.

Jedan is a trackt on the Dayside of Taldain who works under the command of Ais.

Allik Neverfar is a Southern Scadrian.

Krent is House Ladrian's coachman in Elendel.

Fleet is a figure from legends on Roshar.
Halan is an infant in Hallandren on Nalthis stricken with deathfever.

Harth is a swordsman from Alethkar on Roshar.
Magna (Callsign: Morningtide) is a Vician cadet in Skyward Flight.
Riino is a formerly-Hoed Elantrian and a member of the Ire from Sel.

Lord Detor is one of Ashweather Cett's generals during the Siege and Battle of Luthadel.
Vstim is a Thaylen merchant on Roshar.
Dr. Florin Malin is a former government official in the Elendel Basin on Scadrial.
Meala is the head maid of Iadon's palace in Arelon on Sel.

Taran is a serving boy in Tvlakv's slave caravan on Roshar.
An ulatu is a traditional men's garment worn in Jah Keved on Roshar.
Natanatan was one of the Silver Kingdoms on Roshar during the Heraldic Epochs.
Hurli is a Striker guard in the Rose Palace.
Tarma was a kingdom on Roshar during the Desolations of the Heraldic Epochs.
Callsign Cloak is a scout from Ranger flight in the Defiant Defence Force.

Sousa is a pilot in the DDF on Detritus.
Humans on Roshar call the singers parsh or parshmen.

Soomi is a resident of Babilar.
Talik is a Reshi trademaster who lives on Relu-na.

Sixth of the Dusk is the protagonist of the eponymous novella.

Vapor is a figment who lives on Starsight and who works for Cuna.

Beard is an eccentric member of the Kholinar Wall Guard in Alethkar on Roshar.

Miles Dagouter is the main antagonist of The Alloy of Law.

Zezin is a figment who serves Minister Cuna in the Superiority.

Ashyn is a planet in the Rosharan system that will be the setting of The Silence Divine.

Joret is a Skybreaker squire under the Skybreaker masters Ki and Warren.

Manny is the name of an animated mannequin powered by a motivator.

Dashe is an Elantrian from Sel.

Malad-son-Zent was a Shin soldier during the Last Desolation who fought at Aharietiam.

Brightlord Kaves Kholin is a distant Kholin relative that lives in Kholinar during the Era of Solitude.

Vedel is one of the ten Heralds of Honor.
Galid was a classical scholar on Roshar.

Hamel is a darkeyed soldier in Kaladin's squad in Highmarshal Meridas Amaram's army on Roshar.

Zentu is a dione philosopher and scientist and is known for their work on the properties of life.

Denth or VaraTreledees is one of the Five Scholars from Nalthis.

Mistress Halex is the proprietor of a soothing parlor on Decan street in Elendel.
Tet Wikim Davar is a lighteyed Veden on Roshar.
Shardplate is an ancient and magical type of full-body armor found on Roshar.
Lord Waren is a noble in Arelon on Sel. His conversion to Shu-Dereth is an important part of the gyorn Hrathen's plan to convert all of Arelon
Count Graeo is a young member of the Teo court, and the former fiance of Sarene.
